channel.title: [508] NPC Dialogue

item.title: [508] NPC Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Ok, this really pissed me off. I tried to make text on the NPC Bob, I think I forgot to put him in npclist and npcspawn?

Here’s the code I put u guys can see if it’s right or not:

case 13: { p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Bob", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Yessir, I'll leave then.", 241, 4); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Bob", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "I'm sorry, we are closed.", 241, 4); } break;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 03:48:35 am[/size][hr]Can some1 fucking help me because I’m fucking stressed and I feel like punching a wall. I need the right codes…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 05:35:29 am[/size][hr]Cmon some1 help…

Read full topic
